summary:
1. An Enb preset made for Pure Weather users
2. A clear and realistic preset
3. Pure Weathers modified through CK; Sky color/Water colors/Sunlight colors/Fog colors modified
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=6]03/29 ->CR Enb Pure Weather 266 versions Available Now!
[/size][/color][font=Times New Roman][size=5][color=#e06666]Requirement[/color] and [color=#e06666]installation [/color]are just the same as before, but do make sure the new clouds textures also placed to your texture folder. [b]And the CR Enb SnowFx esp is no longer used in the 266 ver; only 265 version users need to check that esp. [/b][/size]

[size=5][color=#1e84cc]266 Features[/color]:[/size]

[size=4][b][color=#ff0000]1.[/color] Droplet displacement effect.
[color=#ff0000]2.[/color] Fake Global illumination.
[color=#ff0000]3.[/color] Two version for users to choose; the one is made of without using any palette; the other is made of using original palette as 265.[/b][/size]

[color=#cccccc][size=4]-Best regards, bigeyescarl aka abc75179778300-[/size]
[/color][/font]
[b]----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
[i]
[color=#ff0000][size=6]Attention please,[/size][/color][/i]
[size=6]*This is a preset made for [/size][size=4][color=#ff0000][i]Pure Weather[/i][/color] [/size][size=6]users only.* [/size]

[color=#f1c232][size=5][i]*Not compatible[/i] with*
[/size]
[list=1][*][b][size=6][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000]CoT[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[/*]
[*][b][size=6][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000]Weather esp from Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[/*]
[*][b][size=6][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000]NLA esp[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[/*]
[*][b][size=6][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000]Remove Exterior Fog[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[/*]
[*][b][size=6][font=Georgia][color=#ff0000]Revamped Exterior Fog[/color][/font][/size][/b]
[/*]
[/list][/color][b][size=6]
[/size][/b][size=5][b][color=#e06666]Requirements[/color][color=#6aa84f]->[/color]
[/b][/size]
[color=#6aa84f]1.[/color][size=4] Pure Weather (Brighter night edition)[/size]
[color=#6aa84f]2.[/color][size=4] Pure Water (v5.0)[/size]
[color=#6aa84f]3.[/color][size=4] ELFX 2.0 (Interior+Exterior+Enhancer)------>Well, it's optional, not totally essential, as it still looks great and even a bit saturated with ELFX 2.0; so install ELFX 2.0 if you prefer more dramatic colors.[/size]

[color=#3d85c6][size=5][b]Installation:[/b][/size][/color]

[size=4][color=#6d9eeb]Step I.[/color] Download latest version ENB files on Enb official website and copy the "d3d9.dll" and "enbhost.exe" to your skyrim folder.[/size]

[size=4][color=#6d9eeb]Step II.[/color] Download "enbhelper" and copy it to your enbseries folder. (the enbseries folder is at the same place where Skyrim launcher is)[/size]

[size=4][color=#6d9eeb][b]Step III[/b].[/color] Copy all of the files in the Main folder to where Skyrim.exe is (usually locates at Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim).[/size]

[size=4][color=#6d9eeb]Step IV.[/color] Editing the following lines in SkyrimPrefs.ini; if one of the lines doesn't exist, just copy the following one and paste it to under the [Display section][/size]

[size=4][Display][/size]
[size=4]bFloatPointRenderTarget=1[/size]
[size=4]bTreesReceiveShadows=1[/size]
[size=4]bDrawLandShadows=1[/size]
[size=4]bShadowsOnGrass=1

[/size][b][color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Step V.[/size][/color][size=6][color=#e06666]Replace the original PureWeather.esp that Laast made; [/color]and[color=#e06666] [/color][/size][size=6][i]Check[/i] the PureWeather.esp[/size][size=4] and [/size][size=6]CR Enb SnowFx.esp[/size][size=4] included in the Data folder once you unzip the CR PureWeather RealisticFanta Enb rar file. 

[/size][/b][color=#6d9eeb][b][size=4]Step VI.  [/size][/b]
[/color][size=6][b][font=Verdana][color=#ff0000]Make sure you save indoors before applying or installing my enb.[/color][/font][/b][/size]

[size=4][b][color=#8e7cc3]Uninstallation[/color][color=#bf9000]:[/color][/b][/size]
[size=4]Just delete the enb related files. Recommend using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7804/?]Enb remover[/url] for easy Enb removing. 

[/size][font=Georgia][size=5][b][color=#ffd966]Features of this preset[/color]:[/b][/size][/font]
[size=5]
1. All modified color filters
2. Droplet effects
3. Weathers fx effects
4. All separated tweaked weather inis  
5. Performance friendly DoF
6. Beautiful scenes
[/size]
[color=#45818e][size=5][b]**Credits**:[/b][/size][/color]

[b][size=4]Boris, the creator of Enb series for skyrim.
(Everyone loves Boris.)

Matso, for the wonderful lens fx file. 
(I love Matso's lens effect very much.)

[b]Miratheus[/b], for the wondrous effect.
(THX you sir for the effect file.)

Laast, the creator of Pure Weather and Pure Water.
(Without Laast's hard work on these two mods, this preset won't be here, so please don't forget to endorse Pure Weather and Pure Water)

--JawZ--, for the seamless sky nif.
(Greatest sky nif ever.)

Mindflux for the snow nif and effects.
(I highly recommend to use his smoking torches, too!)

My friend, Kingeric1992 from Taiwan, for the droplet and frozen vignette effect:
(Oh dear, you rock!)

Clouds Textures credits to jjc71.

PS: Please let me note if I miss someone :D

[/size][/b]///////////////////////////////////////////////////
[b]
Log:
2015/01/11-> V265 released
2015/03/29-> V266 released
[/b]
author: Bigeyescarl aka abc75179778300
